title: Pottery without a wheel
brief_description: The best clay for pottery making is secured in Cornwall. Film shows how clay is prepared and how a thumb pot is made. Also demonstrates how to make a pot or model by the coil method, and how to make tiles and the various methods of decorating then with slip.
